name: Bird 6Match
description:
Bird 6Match is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages. Match same colored Bird Enjoy each and every stage with entertaining challenges.

Install the best match-3 puzzle game to your mobile device & start the adventure today!

★ HD color

★ 200 Levels

★ Boost your score with potent power-ups and Earn three stars on every level!

★ Stellar performance with top-notch graphics, amusing animations and captivating music

★ Easy to add coin, (No Pay)

★ Easy to play but hard to Bird!

★ Try Bird 6Match, the fun addicting finger tapping bird elimination game! with brand new style which brings more fun and joy!
